messages.title: A PROSPEROUS GREEN ECONOMY
messages.content: Dan Yeats would be a strong voice for the Green vision of stronger communities and sustainable jobs.

messages.title: INVEST IN NEW ENERGY JOBS
messages.content: Dan Yeats says "Uncertainties in oil and gas markets mean that this is the right time to invest in new green jobs. Oil and gas has served Aberdeen well and we have world class expertise. We need to help transition those skills to the new sustainable energy economy to protect local jobs and ensure Aberdeen remains the UK's Energy City."

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Not poverty - a Â£10 living wage for all by 2020
Public services in public hands - the railways returned to public ownership
More powers for Scotland and local communities
